channel.title: Apps on GaweTech
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on GaweTech

item.title: Do I Need to Install Antivirus on Windows 11?
item.description: You don’t need to rush to install an antivirus on Windows 11 because your system already has it. Windows 11 comes with many improvements in several sectors such as performance, user experience, design, and security.

item.title: 8 New Differences Microsoft Defender vs. Windows Defender
item.description: Microsoft has officially launched the Microsoft Defender application for several platforms ranging from Windows, Android, iOS, and macOS. Previously, Microsoft already had Windows Defender which was built into the Windows operating system.

item.title: Telegram Premium, What are the Features and Cost?
item.description: Telegram premium or paid service officially launched at the end of June. Its increasingly clear presence is marked by the appearance of a beta version on the App Store with version 8.
